template.name: NWChem SCF Module
template.comment:
NWChem SCF Module -----------------
Au+, Au(14s,10p,8d,3f,2g,1h) -> [11s,10p,8d,3f,2g,1h]
ao basis = "ao basis" functions = 131 atoms = 1 closed shells = 9 open shells = 0 charge = 1.00 wavefunction = RHF input vectors = ./Au+.movecs output vectors = ./Au+.movecs use symmetry = T symmetry adapt = T
